info.author: Stuart Gathman
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
Topic :: Communications :: Email :: Mail Transport Agents
Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
Python GOSSiP library and server.
As SPF is implemented, spammers will also adopt SPF.  With forging
under control, the next step is to track the reputation of domains.
GOSSiP tracks the ratio of spam to ham for the last 1000 messages from
each domain, and computes a reputation score from that that ranges 
from -100 to +100.  It also computes a confidence score that increases
from 0 to 100 with the number and freshness of the observations.
It can also check with peers, and combine scores.  Observations are
provided by a spam filter or user feedback.  Pygossip is supported
by pymilter.

See http://gossip-project.sourceforge.net/
    http://pymilter.sourceforge.net/
info.name: pygossip
info.summary: Python GOSSiP distributed domain reputation service
info.html_description:
Python GOSSiP library and server. As SPF is implemented, spammers will also adopt SPF. With forging under control, the next step is to track the reputation of domains. GOSSiP tracks the ratio of spam to ham for the last 1000 messages from each domain, and computes a reputation score from that that ranges from -100 to +100. It also computes a confidence score that increases from 0 to 100 with the number and freshness of the observations. It can also check with peers, and combine scores. Observations are provided by a spam filter or user feedback. Pygossip is supported by pymilter.

See http://gossip-project.sourceforge.net/
http://pymilter.sourceforge.net/
